title: Solutionreach And Uber Integrate To Improve Patient Accessibility
text: × Patient Relationship Management Technology from Solutionreach LEHI, Utah , Sept. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Solutionreach, the long-standing leader for revolutionary patient relationship management solutions, today announced that they have integrated with Uber, the fast-growing travel company that connects riders to local drivers through a mobile app. Founded in 2000, Solutionreach pioneered text and email-based patient communication and has continued introducing healthcare practitioners to an increasing number of unique solutions for managing relationships with their patients throughout the continuum of care. The Solutionreach-Uber integration brings patient accessibility to a new level. Patients now have a convenient tool which makes it easier to reach their physicians, keep their care appointments, and maintain their health. Uber gained popularity by offering a simple solution for connecting riders to their communities. Through today's integration, that momentum will be used to improve healthcare by making it easier and more convenient for patients to connect to their providers. The combination of the Solutionreach intelligence, which identifies when a patient needs to be seen by their doctor, and Uber's ability to precisely deliver the patient directly to the practice, brings an innovative, first-to-market development for further ensuring the best health outcomes. "We are always looking for new and innovative ways to make a difference for both the patient and the provider throughout the continuum of healthcare," says Jim Higgins , Founder and CEO of Solutionreach, "and this integration is reflective of that." "Our API makes it easy: we take riders wherever they need to go, from wherever they are," says Matt Wyndowe , Head of Product Partnerships at Uber. "We saw how Solutionreach had been helping patients connect with their healthcare providers and knew they could do great things with our API. Now, through this new integration, riders aren't just getting better access to their cities–they are getting access to better health." Learn more about Solutionreach by calling (866) 605-6867 or visiting www.solutionreach.com . About SolutionreachSolutionreach provides a customized, cloud-based platform that delivers information and communication patients need to stay healthy and more personally connected to their healthcare providers. It includes patient engagement tools to assist practices in streamlining tasks that will increase office efficiency, eliminate inaccuracies, and maximize profitability. The company has continually developed new industry-leading technologies as they've steadily grown from the pioneer in digital patient messaging to a revolutionary platform for total patient engagement.
